item.description: Talk is cheapï¼ŒShow me your code. ç±»å‹å°è£…ï¼Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€æ•°ç»„ã€æ­£åˆ™ã€çº¯å¯¹è±¡… // ç±»å‹è¾…åŠ©å‡½æ•° const typeToString = <T>(type: T) => { return Object.prototype.toString.call(type).slice(8, -1) } /** * è¿™é‡Œä¸ç›´æ¥å†™è¿”å› booleançš„åŸå› æ˜¯å‡½æ•°å¤šç”¨äºæ¡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œ * å¦‚æœæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™... å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼Œåˆ™... * ç„¶è€Œåœ¨tsè¿è¡Œç¯å¢ƒä¸­ï¼Œé™¤éå†™æ³›å‹ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å¤šè¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œä¸ç„¶å°±ä¼šå‡ºç°æŠ¥é”™ï¼Œæ— æ³•ç²¾ç¡®å…·ä½“ç±»å‹ã€‚ */ const isString = (str: any): str is string => typeof str === 'string' const isNumber = (num: any): num is string => typeof num === 'number' const isRegExp = (reg: any): reg is RegExp => typeToString(reg) === 'RegExp' const isFunction = (func: any): func is Function => typeof func === 'function' const isObject = (obj: any): obj is Object => typeof obj === 'object' // waiting problem const isArray = Array.
